writeups.title: Sensitive Data Exposure - Number Phone in API Response Gov Website
writeups.content:
Chouw hunters!

I founded a vulnerability sensitive data exposure in API response at one of my city goverments websites. Sensitive data includes :

  1. Number Phone
  2. Personal Email
  3. Position
  4. Many more..


Why the data is sensitive? Because this website used by Government officials. Step to Reproduce :

  1. Go to masking.karawangkab.go.id
  2. Go to register page
  3. Fill NIP field (You can search public NIP in Google)
  4. Turn on intercept burpsuite
  5. Submit form
  6. Get the response and you will see sensitive data!



Timeline :

22-10-2021 Report

26-10-2021 Response from Diskominfo Karawang

26-10-2021 Got Reward!

writeups.title: ($114) XSS/HTML Injection to Deface - BuilthWithAngga
writeups.content:
Chouw Hunters!

I found XSS and HTML Injection at BWA website. This vulnerability can Stealing Cookie and Deface Page. I dont know why this vulnerability still execution although his website using Laravel framework (should had done filtering XSS and HTML injection).


Gooow to PoC :

  1. Go to karya page
  2. Add new Karya
  3. Inject payload at Description field
  4. Upload Karya
  5. Go to target page
  6. Payload Executed!

PoC Video :


Timeline :

22-07-2022 Report

26-07-2022 Got the Reward 💸 (Free 3 Premium Class and Certificate)

writeups.title: Sensitive Data Exposure - Subdomain Polri
writeups.content:
Sensitive Data Includes :

  1. Ijazah anggota Polri
